name: Blood and Water
overview: A young female police detective is fighting cancer while trying to solve the murder of a Vancouver billionaire's drug-addicted son.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Detective Jo Bradley receives a frantic phone call from her friend, Teresa Fai, whose boyfriend Jimmy Lin is on the run after witnessing a brutal murder. But finding Jimmy will once again bring Jo and her partner Detective Evan Ong into the orbit of Teresa’s father-in-law, ruthless billionaire Ron Xie and the undertow of his dark secrets. The stakes escalate when Jo’s investigation forces Evan to make a fateful and, potentially, tragic decision.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When Charlie Xie, the son of a prominent real estate developer, turns up dead, Detective Jo Bradley gets her first case as lead – the same day she also receives devastating personal news.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As the Xie family struggles to accept Charlie's death, Jo finds evidence pointing to the killer, though the motive remains hidden.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Jo and Gorski catch a break in the case, forcing the Xies to close ranks on the investigation. Jo's cancer is interfering with her work and Teresa's condition worsens.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The Xie family struggles to make sense of Charlie's murder while Jo and Gorski look to Anna and James as suspects. Jo feels the pressure of being primary detective and Gorski's starts to recognize that something is seriously wrong with his partner.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Losing patience with Jo's inexperience, Gorski presses to take over the investigation. Time is running out and Lt. Chu is anxious for answers.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Charlie's funeral brings out the worst in the Xies and a terrible secret comes to the surface. Ron Xie confronts Jo but ends up revealing more than he intended.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The cops focus on Paul and Ron as lead suspects and hatch a plan to draw the killer out. Jo visits her mother to ask questions about her past and lies to her about her cancer diagnosis instead. The Xie family secret begins to unravel.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The truth about Charlie’s murder is revealed, and the family must decide how to move forward. A race to catch the killer ensues. Jo makes a decision that will change her life forever.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Under new Commanding Officer Lt. Dan Barron, Jo Bradley and Detective Evan Ong investigate the murder of victim´s rights advocate Jennifer Liu. The Xie family fight a hostile takeover bid, unaware their daughter Anna has secretly returned from China.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Evan brings Ron Xie in for questioning. Victor Li and his son Zhongchen continue their push to buy Xie Holdings. Ron discovers the Li’s backed the smear campaign against him. Ron tells his bodyguard to destroy evidence linking him to Jennifer Liu.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Evan brings Teresa in for questioning. Anna and Zhongchen struggle to keep their relationship a secret. Victor visits Weiran and powerful emotions are aroused. Jo receives a new batch of letters.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Evan and Jo bring Ron’s bodyguard in for questioning. Jo confronts her mother about the mysterious letters. Victor discovers Zhongchen and Anna’s secret affair. Jo and Evan cross a line.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Jo responds to a jailhouse request. Anna is called in for questioning and a secret is revealed. She convinces Jo and Evan to let her help them catch a killer. Jo is stunned to receive a package from Weiran.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Anna’s life is risked. A murderer is revealed. The remains of the Xie family attempt at a new beginning. Enraged, Jo confronts her mother and makes a dangerous, impulsive decision.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Detective Jo Bradley receives a frantic phone call from her friend, Teresa Fai, whose boyfriend Jimmy Lin is on the run after witnessing a brutal murder. But finding Jimmy will once again bring Jo and her partner Detective Evan Ong into the orbit of Teresa’s father-in-law, ruthless billionaire Ron Xie and the undertow of his dark secrets. The stakes escalate when Jo’s investigation forces Evan to make a fateful and, potentially, tragic decision.
